## createRegexFromSuggester variable

Create a regex expression to evaluate matches directly from the suggester properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createRegexFromSuggester: ({ char, matchOffset, startOfLine, supportedCharacters, }: Pick<Required<Suggester<import("@remirror/core-types").AnyFunction<void>>>, "char" | "startOfLine" | "supportedCharacters" | "matchOffset">, flags?: string) => RegExp
```
